word_mean: 胆管造影术：口服、静脉或经皮肤注射造影剂后摄取胆管的放射线相

sentence.Network_en: Cholangiography was routinely performed between postoperative days 10 - 14 and later on demand.
sentence.Network_cn: 术后 10-14 天按常规做了胆管造影及后来需要时才做.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To evaluate the application of intraoperative cholangiography in minicholecystomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨术中胆道造影在小切口胆囊切除术中的应用价值.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To investigate the value of intraoperative cholangiography in laparoscopic cholecystectomy ( LC ).
sentence.Network_cn: 目的评价术中胆道造影技术在腹腔镜 胆囊 切除术中的应用价值.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 郑州大学第一附属医院-科普常识 ... chamber （身体或器官内的）室 cholangiography 胆管造影术 cholecystitis 胆囊炎.
Re:英语实用分类词汇 ... cholecystectomy 胆囊切除 cholangiography 胆道造影术 cholecystoenterostomy 胆囊空肠吻合术.
cholangiography 进气道, cholangiography 造影, cholangiography 选择性胆道造影术
... 大腿肿瘤;非典型性脂肪瘤样肿瘤/高分化脂肪肉瘤胆道造影(cholangiography)就是利用各种方法使造影剂进入胆道，使胆道能在 X 线.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1930s: coined in Spanish from Greek khole 'bile' + angeion 'vessel' + -graphia (see -graphy)

means.word_mean: 1. roentgenographic examination of the bile ducts after a contrast medium has been injected
